name: Andor
summary: 故事的时间背景设定于2016年上映的电影《星球大战外传：侠盗一号》中事件的5年前，讲述在义军同盟尚未成立之际，情报官卡西恩·安道尔的冒险经历。
info:
• 中文名: 安多
  • 原作: George Lucas
  • 执行制片人: Kathleen Kennedy、Diego Luna
  • 主演: Diego Luna
  • 配角: Genevieve O'Reilly、Fiona Shaw、Andy Serkis
  • 制作: Lucasfilm
  • 别名: 星球大战外传：侠盗一号角色前传剧
  • 集数: 12
  • 开始: 2022-09-21
  • 结束: 2022-11-23
  • 类型: 动作/科幻/冒险
  • 国家/地区: 美国
  • 语言: 英语
  • 电视网: Disney+
  • 台湾名称: 安道爾
  • 官方网站: https://www.starwars.com/series/andor
  • imdb_id: tt9253284
  • 导演: Toby Haynes、Susanna White、Benjamin Caron
  • 编剧: Tony Gilroy、Dan Gilroy、Stephen Schiff、Beau Willimon
  • 音乐: Nicholas Britell

eps.name: Kassa
eps.desc: Cassian Andor's reckless search for answers about his past makes him a wanted man.

eps.name: That Would Be Me
eps.desc: Cassian attempts to lay low on Ferrix as agents of the law close in.

eps.name: Reckoning
eps.desc: Cassian's desperation to avoid arrest leads him to a mysterious man with unknown connections.

eps.name: Aldhani
eps.desc: Out of options, Cassian is recruited for a dangerous mission to infiltrate an Imperial garrison.

eps.name: The Axe Forgets
eps.desc: Cassian must carefully navigate the distrust inherent in being the new member of a secret operation.

eps.name: The Eye
eps.desc: With cover from a spectacular local festival, the Aldhani mission reaches a point of no return.

eps.name: Announcement
eps.desc: The repercussions of the Aldhani heist reach all the way to Coruscant, while Cassian returns home.

eps.name: Narkina 5
eps.desc: The Empire catches up to Cassian, but are as yet unaware of his identity and past.

eps.name: Nobody's Listening!
eps.desc: Under intense scrutiny while imprisoned, Cassian makes allies plan an impossible escape.

eps.name: One Way Out
eps.desc: A rare opportunity opens and the time for Cassian and his fellow inmates to act is now.

eps.name: Daughter of Ferrix
eps.desc: A fugitive once more, Cassian must make his next move before it is too late.

relations.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
